alert.note: Alert for Lassen (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 16 at 12:53PM PDT until March 16 at 8:20PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by runoff from previous excessive rainfall and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northeast California, including the following county, Lassen. * WHEN...Until 100 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas along the Pit River and into Big Valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1249 PM PDT, The Pit River will continue to rise through the end of the week, with minor flooding possible. Additional contributions from local creeks may compound flooding issues in Big Valley. - This is a very slowly responding basin and will take a long time to drain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nubieber, Bieber. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
